EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber} Repair Order AOG Fee Approval PO, Tail # {!Case.Aircraft_Tail_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have indicated that you have an Aircraft On Ground (AOG) requirement.
Please be advised that an expedite fee will be added to your invoice. The fee will be $1,000.00 or 10% per unit of the total cost of repair, whichever one is higher.
If you would like our AOG team to have this unit expedited through repair, please acknowledge in writing that you accept this additional charge.
For all AOG inquires or orders support please provide ALL of the following required AOG details:
NEXT SCHEDULED FLIGHT OUT DATE: LOCATION OF GROUNDED AIRCRAFT: TAIL NUMBER: AIRCRAFT TYPE: AIRCRAFT SERIAL NUMBER:
Once we receive all above information we will proceed with upgrading your Repair Order to AOG.
If you choose NOT to pursue this avenue, please remove AOG@Honeywell.com from copy and continue to work with your Repair Administrator to expedite the repair order on a critical or urgent basis.
Honeywell AOG Team http://www.MyAerospace.com
